Unable to reproduce. Need more information.
PR was not targeted to any particular release. Changing target milestone to 2.1

Sanity level 1 now passes without any errors in the logfile: CDT build
200408191725. Can close this defect.

Still happens from time to time. Needs more investigation. 
Moving the target milestone to 3.0 because it doesn't affect the debugging 
process.

At the monthly CDT conference call (June 2005). We agreed that it is invalid to
have a defect assigned to a inbox owner AND set to a valid release (they should
be  assigned to future).  The June 3/2005 deadline for triaging these defects
has passes, so I am moving all the remaining ones to future.
